definition: the West/abbr. for Spain 西班牙[Xi1 ban1 ya2]/Spanish

sentences.english: A lot of them are actually English-as-a-Second-Language learners, but for Spanish, so.
sentences.chinese: 他們本身是西班牙人，英語是他們的第二語言。

sentences.english: He is one of very few Hispanic people to have run a major US corporation.
sentences.chinese: 他是少數經營美國大公司的美籍西班牙人之一。

sentences.english: Something tells me the Portuguese and Spaniard haven't shared too many bottles of plonk after a game.
sentences.chinese: 有現象表明葡萄牙人和西班牙人在賽後很少把酒言歡。

sentences.english: We Spaniards have lined up against each other all too often.
sentences.chinese: 我們西班牙人太愛窩裏鬥了。

sentences.english: Camacho to coach national soccer team.
sentences.chinese: 西班牙人卡馬喬就任中國足球教練。

sentences.english: The Spanish, in third place, are the coolest Europeans.
sentences.chinese: 排行第三的西班牙人是最酷的歐洲人。

sentences.english: The Spaniards are nutty about it.
sentences.chinese: 那些西班牙人簡直都快爲之瘋狂了。

sentences.english: Dani Jarque was a defender for the team and served on Espanyol in his whole life.
sentences.chinese: 作爲後衛的丹尼爾雅爾克一生均在西班牙人隊踢球。

sentences.english: He hasn't given up hope of beating the 22 - year - old Spaniard.
sentences.chinese: 他還沒有放棄擊敗22歲西班牙人的希望。

sentences.english: Can you pour wine straight down your throat, as they do in Spain ?
sentences.chinese: 你不能像西班牙人一切工作樣把酒直接從喉嚨裏灌下？

sentences.english: Most Spaniards do not speak English, especially in the less-touristy cities.
sentences.chinese: 大部分西班牙人都不說英語，特別是在遊客少的城市。

sentences.english: The Spaniard's disarming humility and confidence has brought him some joy.
sentences.chinese: 西班牙人沒有防備心的性格和自信使他非常的舒心。

sentences.english: The English and the Spanish were among the first to colonize North America.
sentences.chinese: 英國人和西班牙人是首先向北美洲開拓殖民地的。

sentences.english: Hleb could slip a pass to the Spaniard who lashed his shot past Schmeichel.
sentences.chinese: 赫萊布傳球，西班牙人射門攻破了舒梅切爾的十指關。

sentences.english: Bardem is from Spain, and other Europeans also won top acting honors. Helen Mirren announced the winner for best actor.
sentences.chinese: 爾頓是西班牙人，而其他歐洲演員也贏得了大獎。

sentences.english: The city has large black and Hispanic populations .
sentences.chinese: 這個城市裏有很多黑種人和西班牙人。

pinyin: Yi1 bi3 li4 ya4 Ban4 dao3

definition: Málaga, Spain/Malaga city in Iranian East Azerbaijan

pinyin: La1 si1 pa4 er3 ma3 si1
